meanings.definition: To perceive or recognize by or as if by the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: The dog was scenting the delicious food from the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys scenting the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The detective was scenting out the hidden clues in the room.
meanings.sent4: The hunter was scenting danger in the air.
meanings.sent5: The chef was scenting the spices to create a flavorful dish.

meanings.definition: To fill with an odor; perfume.
meanings.sent1: She was scenting her room with a calming lavender fragrance.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was scenting the street with the aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The skunk was scenting the whole neighborhood with its unique smell.
meanings.sent4: The flowers were scenting the air with their sweet perfume.
meanings.sent5: The candle was scenting the room with a warm vanilla scent.

meanings.definition: To get a hint or inkling of.
meanings.sent1: He was scenting trouble in the way his friend was acting.
meanings.sent2: She was scenting success in the positive feedback she received.
meanings.sent3: The student was scenting the upcoming surprise test from the teacher's behavior.
meanings.sent4: The team was scenting victory after a series of wins.
meanings.sent5: The weather forecaster was scenting a storm approaching based on the dark clouds.
